name: The Stand-In Showman
description:
Play as John Actington who needs to fill in for roles on a stage in a debuff focused, strategy-heavy turn based rpg! You not only need to beat the opponent, but also look cool when doing so. 

Use a multitude of moves, voice lines, and debuffs!

Face against powerful actors, such as the HERO, Hiiro Proatag and the VILLAIN, Manley Powers JR

Debuff / buff guide (don't read if you want to have a learning experience)

- Intimidated - Causes enemies to deal less damage, and allows you to heal when attacking them

- Dazed - Causes enemies to sometimes miss their attacks

- Paranoid - If you attack before the enemy, they flinch and lose their turn, however the enemy gains extra speed

- Stealth - Can stack. Increases speed slightly and multi-hit attacks will consume them to attack more times

- Drunk - deals slightly extra damage but has a chance to miss attacks

- Popular - Can stack. gains extra popularity
